remarks:
A chained equality inference, useful for converting to definitions. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) 

---

 A chained equality inference, useful for converting to definitions. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
3eqtr4g.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
3eqtr4g.2 $e |- C = A $.
3eqtr4g.3 $e |- D = B $.
3eqtr4g $p |- ( ph -> C = D ) $.
